title: Stock Futures Rise Ahead of Microsoft, Twitter Earnings
sub_head: Nasdaq-100 on course to gain as investors await results from Google parent Alphabet, Microsoft and Twitter
body:
U.S. stock futures gained ahead of a bumper day of earnings from some of Americaâ€™s largest corporations, including major tech names.
Futures tied to the S&P 500 edged up 0.4% Tuesday, a day after the broad index hit its latest in a string of record highs. Technology-heavy Nasdaq-100 futures rose 0.7%, while futures for the blue-chip Dow Jones Industrial Average inched up 0.3%.
